css:
<style>
.print-format {
    margin-left:05mm;
    margin-top:05mm;
    margin-right:05mm;
    margin-bottom:05mm;
    page-size: A6;
}
.print-format td, .print-format th {
    vertical-align: top !important;
    padding: 0.5px !important;
}
@media screen {
    .print-format {
    /*PRINTABLE WIDTH: 21.0cm */
    width: 4in;
    /*PRINTABLE HEIGHT: 29.7cm*/
    /*PADDING FROM MARGINS: 0.9cm, .354331in */
    padding: 0.5cm;
    }
    }
.float-container {
    border: 3px solid #fff;
    padding: 2px;
}

.float-child {
    width: 50%;
    float: left;
    padding: 2px;
    border-bottom: 1px solid black;
}
.blue{
    text-align:right;
}
.float-child-2{
    width: 50%;
    float:left;
    padding:2px;
}
.float-container-2 {
    padding: 5px;
}
.head-section{
    border-bottom: 1px solid black;
}
</style>
html:
Date: {{ frappe.utils.get_datetime(doc.date).strftime('%d-%b-%Y %I:%M%p') }}
{% if doc.print_date_time %}
Print Date: {{ frappe.utils.get_datetime(doc.print_date_time).strftime('%d-%b-%Y %I:%M%p') }}
{% endif %}
PICK LIST
{{doc.name}}
Customer's PO - {{doc.po_no}}
Customer - {{doc.customer}}
SE Reference - {{doc.ifw_old_reference}}
Customer's PO Date - {{doc.get_formatted('po_date')}}
{{doc.barcode}}
{% if doc.is_rush == 1 -%}
RUSHORDER!!!
{% endif %} {% if frappe.db.get_value("Sales Order", doc.sales_order, "ifw_store_pickup") == 1 -%}
IN STORE PICK UP
{% endif %}
{% macro above_items() %}
{{ doc.sales_order }}
{% endmacro %} {% macro below_items(topage, page) -%}

{{doc.get_formatted("pl_text")}}

{{ _("Page {0} of {1}").format(page, topage)}}

{%- endmacro %} {{ above_items() }} {% set total_rows = doc.locations|length %} {% set ptotal= {'total': 1} %} {% set pagenum= {'num': 1} %} {%- if total_rows > 20 -%} {% if ptotal.update({'total': ptotal.total + (total_rows // 20) }) %}{% endif %} {% endif %} {%- for row in doc.locations -%} {% if row.idx % 21 == 0 %}
Sr RetailSKU Item Name Pick Qty Ifw Location Barcodes
{{below_items(ptotal.total, pagenum.num)}} {% if pagenum.update({'num': pagenum.num + 1}) %}{% endif %}
{{ above_items() }} {% endif %} {{ row.idx }} {{ row.retailskusuffix }} {{ row.item_name }} {{row.picked_qty }} {% if row.ifw_location %} {% set locations = row.ifw_location.split('|') %} {% for location in locations %} {{ location }}
{% endfor %} {% endif %} {% set item = frappe.get_doc("Item", row.item_code) %} {% for barcode in item.barcodes %} {{ barcode.barcode }}
{% endfor %} {%- endfor -%} {%- if doc.discount_amount -%} {%- endif -%} {{ below_items(ptotal.total, ptotal.total) }}
name: Pick List 4*6 Custom
